Class MultiGpuBatcher

java.lang.Object
AI.alphazero.batch.MultiGpuBatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Batcher, Runnable
public class MultiGpuBatcher extends Object implements Runnable, Batcher
A high-performance batcher that distributes inference across multiple worker threads, potentially utilizing multiple GPUs.

It creates a pool of NeuralNetBatcher workers. Incoming requests are round-robin distributed to these workers. This allows for massive parallelism during self-play training.

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiGpuBatcher

      public MultiGpuBatcher(AlphaZeroNet masterNet, int batchSize, int numWorkers)
      Initializes the multi-GPU batcher.

      Clones the master network for each worker to ensure thread safety and independent memory contexts. * @param masterNet the primary neural network

      Parameters:
      batchSize - the target batch size for each worker
      numWorkers - the number of parallel workers (often corresponds to number of GPUs or CPU cores)

  • Method Details

    • predict

      public CompletableFuture<NeuralNetBatcher.Output> predict(float[] input)
      Submits an input for prediction, distributing requests in round-robin fashion across the available workers. * @param input the encoded board state
      Specified by:
      predict in interface Batcher
      Returns:
      a Future that will complete with the network's output (policy and value)

    • updateWeights

      public void updateWeights(AlphaZeroNet master)
      Broadcasts the weights from the master network to all worker networks.

      This is called after a training step to ensure all workers generate self-play data using the latest model. * @param master the network containing the updated weights

    • getBoardSize

      public int getBoardSize()
      Returns the board size configuration of the underlying networks. * @return the board size

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts all worker threads for processing incoming requests.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • startGlobalHeartbeat

      private void startGlobalHeartbeat()
      Starts a global heartbeat thread that periodically logs the total number of samples processed across all workers.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses all workers. Useful during model updates to prevent race conditions.

    • resume

      public void resume()
      Resumes all workers after a pause.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops all workers and releases resources.
